title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 350.5 - Notification
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 350.5 - Notification

State Regulations

Department regulations governing notification of the
district's decision shall be followed whenever a request for assistance or
care, including a request for transfer and reclassification, is accepted or
denied. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
350.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
